sentences.en: A wealthy and powerful businessperson or industrialist; a magnate.
sentences.cn: 巨头富有的、强有力的商人或工业家; 大亨.

sentences.en: Also waiting in the cloning lab this morning is the local industrialist.
sentences.cn: 这天早上同时在实验室等候的还有一位本地的实业家.

sentences.en: Following the local industrialist on the appointments list is the physics laureate.
sentences.cn: 预约名单上排在本地实业家后面的是一位获奖物理学家.

sentences.en: He is generally rated Italy's No. 3 industrialist.
sentences.cn: 他被公认为意大利第三大实业家。

sentences.en: Industrialist Henry J . Kaiser believed that much of his success appositive use of daydreaming.
sentences.cn: 工业家亨利认为他的成功相当程度上应归功于积极地利用白日做梦.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith was a wealthy industrialist, but he was not satisfied with life.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生是位富有的企业家, 可他对生活感到不满意.

sentences.en: Now that appeals to the local industrialist.
sentences.cn: 这深深地吸引了这位本地的实业家.
这名实业家的儿子被绑架了.

sentences.en: The owner of this account is a foreigner, a miner and an industrialist.
sentences.cn: 原因是在此帐户的拥有者是外国人, 矿工和实业家.
他们向这位实业家的腿部射击.

sentences.en: Well - known industrialist. 1964, 11, was born in Yongjia County , Shan Keng Xiang Tang chomchon.
sentences.cn: 著名实业家. 1964年11月出生于永嘉县山坑乡汤店村.

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）
实业家；工业家；产业工人

trans.tran_cn: 工业家，实业家，工业主义者
trans.tran_en: a person who owns or runs a factory or industrial company
